verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: vowed] [ARG1: he can save the American farmer with the new trade deals after China , Canada and Mexico threaten retaliation on U.S. farm goods in response to Trump 's new tariffs] .
President Trump vowed he [V: can] save the American farmer with the new trade deals after China , Canada and Mexico threaten retaliation on U.S. farm goods in response to Trump 's new tariffs .

President Trump vowed [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: can] [V: save] [ARG1: the American farmer] [ARG3: with the new trade deals] [ARGM-TMP: after China , Canada and Mexico threaten retaliation on U.S. farm goods in response to Trump 's new tariffs] .

President Trump vowed he can save the American farmer with the new trade deals after [ARG0: China , Canada and Mexico] [V: threaten] [ARG1: retaliation on U.S. farm goods] [ARGM-PRP: in response to Trump 's new tariffs] .
